[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [BlockDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.blockdragsurfacesvg.md) &gt; [clearAndHide](./blockly.blockdragsurfacesvg.clearandhide.md)

## BlockDragSurfaceSvg.clearAndHide() method

Clear the group and hide the surface; move the blocks off onto the provided element. If the block is being deleted it doesn't need to go back to the original surface, since it would be removed immediately during dispose.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearAndHide(opt_newSurface?: Element): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_newSurface | Element | <i>(Optional)</i> Surface the dragging blocks should be moved to, or null if the blocks should be removed from this surface without being moved to a different surface. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
